pharase_english: Believe in yourself.
pharase_spanish: Cree en ti mismo.

pharase_english: The only limit is your mind.
pharase_spanish: El único límite es tu mente.

pharase_english: You are capable of amazing things.
pharase_spanish: Eres capaz de cosas increíbles.

pharase_english: Dream big and dare to fail.
pharase_spanish: Sueña en grande y atrévete a fallar.

pharase_english: Don't stop until you're proud.
pharase_spanish: No te detengas hasta que estés orgulloso.

pharase_english: Stay positive, work hard, make it happen.
pharase_spanish: Mantente positivo, trabaja duro, haz que suceda.

pharase_english: Your only limit is you.
pharase_spanish: Tu único límite eres tú.

pharase_english: Every day is a second chance.
pharase_spanish: Cada día es una segunda oportunidad.

pharase_english: Success is not for the lazy.
pharase_spanish: El éxito no es para los perezosos.

pharase_english: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
pharase_spanish: No esperes la oportunidad. Créala

pharase_english: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
pharase_spanish: Cree que puedes y ya estás a mitad de camino.

pharase_english: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
pharase_spanish: Trabaja duro en silencio, deja que tu éxito sea tu ruido.

pharase_english: You are stronger than you think.
pharase_spanish: Eres más fuerte de lo que piensas.

pharase_english: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
pharase_spanish: Esfuérzate porque nadie más lo hará por ti.

pharase_english: Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
pharase_spanish: No te rindas. Sufre ahora y vive el resto de tu vida como un campeón.

pharase_english: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
pharase_spanish: Los caminos difíciles a menudo conducen a destinos hermosos.

pharase_english: Stay humble, work hard, be kind.
pharase_spanish: Mantente humilde, trabaja duro, sé amable.

pharase_english: Success doesn't come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
pharase_spanish: El éxito no viene de lo que haces ocasionalmente, viene de lo que haces constantemente.

pharase_english: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
pharase_spanish: Cuanto más trabajes por algo, mejor te sentirás cuando lo logres.

pharase_english: Small steps every day.
pharase_spanish: Pequeños pasos todos los días.

pharase_english: Great things never came from comfort zones.
pharase_spanish: Las grandes cosas nunca vienen de las zonas de confort.

pharase_english: Believe in the magic of beginnings.
pharase_spanish: Cree en la magia de los comienzos.

pharase_english: Be fearless in the pursuit of what sets your soul on fire.
pharase_spanish: Sé valiente en la búsqueda de lo que enciende tu alma.

pharase_english: Make today count.
pharase_spanish: Haz que hoy valga la pena.

pharase_english: Be the energy you want to attract.
pharase_spanish: Sé la energía que quieres atraer.

pharase_english: Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
pharase_spanish: Sueña. Cree. Construye.

pharase_english: Your potential is endless.
pharase_spanish: Tu potencial es infinito.

pharase_english: Good things take time.
pharase_spanish: Las cosas buenas llevan tiempo.

pharase_english: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
pharase_spanish: El éxito no es la clave de la felicidad. La felicidad es la clave del éxito.

pharase_english: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
pharase_spanish: La mejor manera de predecir el futuro es crearlo.
